moves.name: Yawn
moves.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep at the end of the next turn. Fails when used if the target cannot fall asleep or if it already has a non-volatile status condition. At the end of the next turn, if the target is still active, does not have a non-volatile status condition, and can fall asleep, it falls asleep. If the target becomes affected, this effect cannot be prevented by Safeguard or a substitute, or by falling asleep and waking up during the effect.
moves.shortDesc: Puts the target to sleep after 1 turn.

moves.name: Recover
moves.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
moves.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

moves.name: Pain Split
moves.desc: The user and the target's HP become the average of their current HP, rounded down, but not more than the maximum HP of either one.
moves.shortDesc: Shares HP of user and target equally.

moves.name: Muddy Water
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the foe(s) accuracy by 1.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: Helping Hand
moves.desc: The power of the target's attack this turn is multiplied by 1.5 (this effect is stackable). Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user or if the ally already moved this turn, but does not fail if the ally is using a two-turn move.
moves.shortDesc: One adjacent ally's move power is 1.5x this turn.

moves.name: Earth Power
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

moves.name: Acid Armor
moves.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

moves.name: Clear Smog
moves.desc: Resets all of the target's stat stages to 0.
moves.shortDesc: Resets all of the target's stat stages to 0.

moves.name: Sludge
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

abilities.name: Storm Drain
abilities.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Water-type moves and raises its Special Attack by 1 stage when hit by a Water-type move. If this Pokemon is not the target of a single-target Water-type move used by another Pokemon, this Pokemon redirects that move to itself if it is within the range of that move. If multiple Pokemon could redirect with this Ability, it goes to the one with the highest Speed, or in the case of a tie to the one that has had this Ability active longer.
abilities.shortDesc: This Pokemon draws Water moves to itself to raise Sp. Atk by 1; Water immunity.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.desc: This Pokemon cannot lose its held item due to another Pokemon's Ability or attack, unless the attack knocks out this Pokemon. A Sticky Barb will be transferred to other Pokemon regardless of this Ability.
abilities.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot lose its held item due to another Pokemon's Ability or attack.

items.name: Eviolite
items.desc: If holder's species can evolve, its Defense and Sp. Def are 1.5x.

items.name: Leftovers
items.desc: At the end of every turn, holder restores 1/16 of its max HP.

items.name: Rocky Helmet
items.desc: If holder is hit by a contact move, the attacker loses 1/6 of its max HP.
